title: PICS: Influencer recreates Meghan’s best South African tour looks
text:
This isn’t the first time Katie has channelled Meghan’s timeless and polished style.

Body-positive Instagram influencer Katie Sturino just took on the Duchess of Sussex’s South African tour wardrobe.

Katie started off by recreating Meghan’s beige double-breasted trench dress – and it’s spot on! The 38-year-old royal wore nude Stuart Weitzman pumps, but Katie opted for simple block heels.

“Who knew I’d ever want to be wearing a trench dress so badly?” she said in an interview with PEOPLE.

“Meghan wore two of them during this tour and I’ll be adding this one to my closet.”

For her next look, Katie recreated the mom of one’s belted black jumpsuit, which she wore to the Woodstock Exchange in Cape Town.

Read more: Red carpets and the streets have now declared that on Wednesdays, we wear pink... and red

The beauty blogger then tried her hand at Meghan’s casual denim jacket look, which she teamed with a white button-down blouse, evening mimicking the royal’s pose.

This isn’t the first time Katie has channelled Meghan’s timeless and polished style.

Read more: Stylish women in science – these are our favourite looks

Last year, she recreated the duchess’ look at the Your Commonwealth Youth Challenge in London where she wore a stunning yellow dress, Daily Mail reports.

Katie has used her platform to promote ways plus-size women could recreate popular fashion looks.

“You can have the same style, but you don’t have to be that size.”

Sources: PEOPLE, Daily Mail
description: This isn’t the first time Katie has channelled Meghan’s timeless and polished style.
